00032 #ifndef ASCBASE_SPHERE_SURF_SAMPLE_PTS_INCLUDED
00033 #define ASCBASE_SPHERE_SURF_SAMPLE_PTS_INCLUDED
00034 
00035 #include <types.H>
00036 
00037 namespace ASCbase{
00038 
00039   typedef enum{
00040     DISCRETE_SPHERE_LEVEL_ZERO,
00041     DISCRETE_SPHERE_LEVEL_ONE,
00042     DISCRETE_SPHERE_LEVEL_TWO,
00043     DISCRETE_SPHERE_LEVEL_THREE
00044   }sphere_sample_level_t;
00045 
00048 
00064   class DiscreteSphere{
00065   public:    
00067     DiscreteSphere(sphere_sample_level_t lvl = DISCRETE_SPHERE_LEVEL_TWO);
00068 
00070     DiscreteSphere(const DiscreteSphere& src, const my_float_t* R,  
00071                    const my_float_t* T);
00072 
00074     ~DiscreteSphere()
00075     { 
00076       if(A_pts) delete[] A_pts;
00077       A_pts = 0;
00078     }
00079 
00081     void 
00082     scale(my_float_t s)
00083     {
00084       if(A_pts == 0) create_copy(A_orig_pts, &A_pts);
00085       my_float_t* pt = A_pts;
00086       if(A_center[0] == 0.0 && A_center[1] == 0.0 && A_center[2] == 0.0){
00087         for(uint i = 0; i < 3*A_num_pts; ++i, ++pt) *pt *= s;
00088       }else{
00089         my_float_t* c = 0;
00090         for(uint i = 0; i < A_num_pts; ++i){
00091           c = A_center;
00092           for(uint j = 0; j < 3; ++j, ++pt, ++c) *pt = s * (*pt - *c) + *c;
00093         }
00094       }
00095     }
00096 
00098     const my_float_t*
00099     pts_begin() const
00100     { return (A_pts ? A_pts :  A_orig_pts); }
00101 
00103     const my_float_t*
00104     pts_end() const
00105     { 
00106       uint my_end = 3*A_num_pts;
00107       return (A_pts ? A_pts + my_end : A_orig_pts + my_end); 
00108     }
00109  
00111     const uint
00112     num_pts() const
00113     { return A_num_pts; }
00114 
00115   private:
00117     void 
00118     create_copy(const my_float_t* src, my_float_t** dest);
00119 
00120     const my_float_t* A_orig_pts; 
00121     uint A_num_pts;               
00122     my_float_t* A_pts;            
00123     my_float_t A_center[3];       
00124  
00125     static const uint level_0_len; 
00126     static const uint level_1_len; 
00127     static const uint level_2_len; 
00128     static const uint level_3_len; 
00129     static const my_float_t level_0[]; 
00130     static const my_float_t level_1[]; 
00131     static const my_float_t level_2[]; 
00132     static const my_float_t level_3[]; 
00133   };
00134 }
00135 #endif
